Outrage after rental home offer asks for $200 a week to use portaloo bathroom https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/outrage-after-rental-home-offer-asks-for-200-a-week-to-use-portaloo-bathroom/YIDUCA3XDVHK7KUGLROYXAHO34/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/outrage-after-rental-home-offer-asks-for-200-a-week-to-use-portaloo-bathroom/YIDUCA3XDVHK7KUGLROYXAHO34/ It might appear a normal listing. But there is a major catch. Tue, 12 Nov 2024 04:47:23 +0000 A Brisbane house share listing was advertising a private room and bathroom for $200 per week. However, the bathroom was actually a portaloo.
